summary.span: 定义连接点对象，该对象允许服务器控件作为提供者，以形成与使用者的连接。

span.span: Defines a connection point object that enables a server control acting as a provider to form a connection with a consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在两个服务器控件之间每个 Web 部件连接中，每个控件必须具有 （还有其他要求） 关联的连接点对象，使它连接到另一个控件，并能够提供或使用数据，具体取决于控件指定为该提供程序或使用者的连接。In every Web Parts connection between two server controls, each control must have (among other requirements) an associated connection point object that enables it to connect to the other control and to either provide or consume data, depending on whether the control is designated as the provider or consumer for the connection. 一个对象通常包含有关如何控制可以连接到另一个控件和可共享的数据类型的详细信息。A object in general contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share. 对于作为连接中提供的控件，其连接点必须是对象。For a control acting as the provider in a connection, its connection point must be a object. 有关 Web 部件连接和连接点的详细信息，请参阅下面的另请参见部分中列出的主题。For details on Web Parts connections and connection points, see the topics listed in the See Also section below. 若要创建对象，则需要几个步骤：To create a object, several steps are required: 1. 创建一个接口。Create an interface. 当与使用者提供程序共享数据时，它会通过获取接口的实例并将该实例返回给使用者。When a provider shares data with a consumer, it does so by getting an instance of an interface, and returning that instance to a consumer. 2. 在提供程序中实现的接口。Implement the interface in a provider. 一个或其他服务器控件 (任何类型的服务器控件中区域可用) 将提供程序必须实现第一步中创建的接口。A or other server control (any type of server control in a zone can be used) that will be the provider must implement the interface created in the first step. 3. 标识一个回调方法。Identify a callback method. 提供程序中的方法必须标识为要建立的连接的回调方法。A method in the provider must be identified as the callback method to establish a connection. 此方法返回给使用者实现的接口的实例。This method returns an instance of the implemented interface to a consumer. Web 部件方法，以确定提供程序中的回调方法将添加`ConnectionProvider`元数据特性 (由定义类) 到接口实例返回的方法。The Web Parts approach for identifying a callback method in the provider is to add a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute (defined by the class) to the method that returns the interface instance. 添加属性后，所需的唯一参数时要使用的提供者连接点的显示名称。When the attribute is added, the only required parameter is a display name to use for the provider connection point. 可选参数还可以添加，如连接点的 ID。Optional parameters can also be added, such as an ID for the connection point. 控件具有已配置为提供者后，该控件可以参与连接 （假定使用者控制了类似配置并且可用）。After a control has been equipped to act as a provider, the control can participate in connections (assuming that a consumer control is similarly equipped and available). 若要在 Web 页面的标记中创建的静态声明性连接，开发人员可以使用``元素。To create a static, declarative connection in the markup of a Web page, developers can use the `` element. 如果`ConnectionProvider`属性标识的回调方法提供程序源代码中指定的 ID 的连接点，则必须将该值分配给`ProviderConnectionPointID`属性中``页面上的元素。If the `ConnectionProvider` attribute in the provider source code that identifies the callback method specifies an ID for the connection point, then that value must be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element on a page. 开发人员可能会指定提供者连接点的 ID 的原因之一是提供者控件中是否有多个连接点。One reason that a developer might specify an ID for a provider connection point is if there are multiple connection points in the provider control. 如果没有为提供者控件中的提供程序连接点指定一个 ID，一个值，无需分配给`ProviderConnectionPointID`属性页中，因为该连接将使用从获取的默认值创建字段。If an ID is not specified for the provider connection point in the provider control, a value does not have to be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the page either, because the connection will be created using a default value obtained from the field. 若要在代码中创建的连接，开发人员必须创建一个新对象通过调用方法，并将其传递给提供程序控件，以及 ID 或索引的定义的 ID提供者控件中的对象。To create a connection in code, developers must create a new object by calling the method and passing to it the ID of the provider control, along with the ID or index of the defined object in the provider control. 返回对象，对提供者控件的引用以及对使用者控件和相应的引用对象，同时传递给方法来创建一个新对象。The returned object, along with a reference to the provider control, a reference to the consumer control, and a corresponding object, are all passed to the method to create a new object. 虽然开发人员可以使用提供者连接点，以声明方式或以编程方式建立连接的过程，用户还可以与提供者连接点建立连接通过用户界面 (UI) 交互。Although developers can use provider connection points as part of establishing connections either declaratively or programmatically, users can also interact with provider connection points to establish connections through the user interface (UI). 如果开发人员声明控件在网页上，它提供了用户创建连接的运行时 UI。If developers declare a control on a Web page, it provides a run-time UI for users to create connections. 如果用户选择的使用者控件作为起点来建立连接，通过单击其连接谓词 （它们还可以选择提供程序; 没有任何区别中生成连接），他们将在 UI 中看到的下拉列表控件可用的提供程序连接点 （或如果有多个工具的点） 的显示名称。If users choose the consumer control as the starting point for establishing the connection by clicking its connect verb (they could also choose the provider; there is no difference in the resulting connection), in the UI they will see a drop-down list control with the display name of the available provider connection point (or points if there are multiple ones). 用户必须选择要创建的连接提供者连接点。Users must select a provider connection point to create a connection. 一个对象将直接与一个特定的提供程序相关联，并将连接的详细信息存储在它继承自基类的属性类。A object associates directly with a specific provider control, and stores details about a connection in the properties it inherits from the base class. 例如，在继承属性提供者连接点保存的提供程序返回的接口的类型。For example, in the inherited property, a provider connection point keeps the type of interface returned by the provider. 如果提供程序和中均使用相同的连接使用者接口类型，这些控件是兼容并能建立直接连接。If the provider and consumer in a connection both work with the same interface type, the controls are compatible and capable of forming a direct connection. 如果提供程序和使用者不能使用相同的接口类型，它们是不兼容，并且必须使用对象将提供者连接点到使用者可以使用的类型的值。If the provider and consumer cannot work with the same interface type, they are incompatible and must use a object to translate the provider connection point's value into a type that the consumer can work with. 另一个重要的继承的属性是属性，它提供一个友好名称以供用户选择的提供程序连接用户界面中显示点创建连接时。Another important inherited property is the property, which provides a friendly name to display in the UI for users to choose a provider connection point when creating connections. 显示名称是必需的参数，当开发人员添加`ConnectionProvider`属性提供者控件中的回调方法。The display name is the required parameter when developers add a `ConnectionProvider` attribute to the callback method in a provider control. 继承属性也很有用，如上所述，因为它提供者连接点提供的唯一标识符，在的提供程序具有多个连接点。The inherited property is also useful, as indicated above, because it provides a unique identifier for a provider connection point in the event that a provider has multiple connection points. 一个提供程序可以有多个对象定义中，然后在此情况下，当开发人员添加`ConnectionProvider`属性的方法，它们应指定一个 ID 值来区分每个连接点。A provider can have multiple objects defined in it, and in this case, when developers add the `ConnectionProvider` attribute to a method, they should specify an ID value to distinguish each connection point. 另一个值得注意的继承的属性是属性，用于指示提供者连接点是否可以同时连接到多个使用者。One other notable inherited property is the property, which indicates whether a provider connection point can connect simultaneously to multiple consumers. 此属性的值是`true`默认情况下，为提供者连接点 (而它将默认为`false`的使用者连接点)。This property value is `true` by default for provider connection points (whereas it defaults to `false` for consumer connection points). 类会将多个唯一的方法添加到成员它继承自类。The class adds several unique methods to the members it inherits from the class. 方法检索回调方法将返回给使用者的接口的实例。The method retrieves an instance of the interface that the callback method will return to consumers. 方法检索其他使用者接口属于的现有连接，但不是接口用于建立连接。The method retrieves additional consumer interfaces that are part of an existing connection, but are not the interfaces used to establish the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了以声明方式创建连接，以编程方式或通过用户界面，每种情况中都使用的提供者连接点的简单方法。The following code example shows simple ways to create a connection declaratively, programmatically, or through the UI, in each case making use of a provider connection point. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源代码文件包含一个简单的接口名为`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 此外，还有类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`的实现接口，并充当提供者控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 该方法只需返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意，该方法标记与`ConnectionProvider`其元数据中的属性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识提供者连接点的回调方法作为该方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 另类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并充当使用者的连接。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法标记为与使用者的连接点方法`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识使用者控件中的连接点方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指令用于注册的自定义控件形成连接，并使用户能够更改的用户控件在页面上显示模式。Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page. 以声明方式内创建连接本身``页上的元素。The connection itself is created declaratively within the `` element on the page. 此示例演示创建连接的一种方法-请注意`ProviderConnectionPointID`属性中``元素。This demonstrates one way of creating a connection--note the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element. 此外可以以编程方式; 创建连接执行该操作的代码位于`Button1_Click`方法。You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is in the `Button1_Click` method. 在这种情况下，对象是创建并随后传递到创建实际的连接的方法。In this case, a object is created and then passed to a method that creates the actual connection. 是否以声明方式或以编程方式创建的连接，连接点必须始终指定提供程序和使用者。Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer. `Button2_Click`方法访问对象提供程序和使用者，并将一些其属性值写入到页中的标签。The `Button2_Click` method accesses the objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button. 有关建立在声明性的连接中的提供程序和使用者连接点的信息将出现。Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears. 接下来，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换到页连接模式。Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode. 上的谓词菜单**ZIP Code 使用者**控件 （由标题栏中的向下箭头表示），单击连接谓词。On the verbs menu of the **ZIP Code Consumer** control (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. UI 显示方式，连接会自动创建``页面中声明的控件。The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `` control declared in the page. 这是另一种方式创建的连接 （通过用户界面），以及前面所述的声明性和编程方法。This is another way of creating a connection (through the UI), along with the declarative and programmatic methods discussed earlier. 单击**断开连接**按钮来终止现有的静态连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing static connection. 单击**创建提供程序的连接**链接。Click the **Create a Connection to a Provider** link. UI 现在显示一个下拉列表控件，其中列出了提供程序连接点的显示名称。The UI now displays a drop-down control that lists the provider connection point display name. 在下拉列表中，选择连接点，然后单击**Connect**以完成连接。Select the connection point in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection. 接下来，单击**断开连接**试。Next, click **Disconnect** again. 然后，单击**动态连接**按钮以编程方式创建的连接。Then, click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically. 使用**显示模式**控件以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 单击**点连接的详细信息**按钮同样，若要一次指示提供者连接点对象有关的详细信息。Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to once more indicate details about the provider connection point object. 建立的连接并使用以下三种方式提供者连接点演示了示例： 在 Web 页面标记; 中声明静态连接在使用的代码中创建的连接对象和由用户通过连接用户界面创建的连接。The example has demonstrated establishing a connection and using a provider connection point in three ways: a static connection declared in the Web page markup; a connection created in code that used a object; and a connection created by a user through the connection UI.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
Web Parts Connections Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public ProviderConnectionPoint (System.Reflection.MethodInfo callbackMethod, Type interfaceType, Type controlType, string displayName, string id, bool allowsMultipleConnections);

public: ProviderConnectionPoint(System::Reflection::MethodInfo ^ callbackMethod, Type ^ interfaceType, Type ^ controlType, System::String ^ displayName, System::String ^ id, bool allowsMultipleConnections);

param.name: callbackMethod
param.span: 提供者控件中的方法，该方法将接口实例返回给使用者以建立连接。

span.span: The method in the provider control that returns an interface instance to consumers to establish a connection.

param.name: interfaceType
param.span: 提供者提供给使用者的接口的 。

span.span: The of the interface that the provider serves to consumers.

param.name: controlType
param.span: 与提供者连接点相关联的提供者控件的 。

span.span: The of the provider control with which the provider connection point is associated.

param.name: displayName
param.span: 在连接用户界面 (UI) 中向用户显示的提供者连接点的友好显示名称。

span.span: A friendly display name for the provider connection point that appears to users in the connection user interface (UI).

param.name: id
param.span: 提供者连接点的唯一标识符。

span.span: A unique identifier for the provider connection point.

param.name: allowsMultipleConnections
param.span: 一个布尔值，指示提供者连接点是否可以同时与多个使用者保持连接。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether the provider connection point can have multiple simultaneous connections with consumers.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类只需调用基构造函数中，将传递给它的各种参数和初始化类的基类。The constructor for the class simply calls the base constructor, passing to it the various parameters and initializing the base class. 基类构造函数检查连接点的参数编号，并可能会引发几个例外情况。The base class constructor checks a number of the parameters for a connection point and can throw several exceptions. 有关可能的异常的列表，请参阅异常部分。For a list of possible exceptions, see the Exceptions section. 您可以调用构造函数创建的实例类。You can call the constructor to create your own instance of the class. 但是，在你所在只需建立的连接并不扩展类的情况下，应调用方法从提供程序返回现有的连接点对象。However, in cases where you are simply establishing a connection and not extending the class, you should call the method to return an existing connection point object from a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义提供程序连接点。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom provider connection point. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 包含提供程序的源文件控件，使用者控制和自定义对象。A source file that contains a provider control, a consumer control, and a custom object. - 承载静态连接中的控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the controls in a static connection. - 如何运行此代码示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example code. 代码示例的第一部分是提供程序和使用者的源控件和自定义类，名为`TableProviderConnectionPoint`。The first part of the code example is the source for the provider and consumer controls, and a custom class, named `TableProviderConnectionPoint`. 请注意，构造函数的`TableProviderConnectionPoint`类会调用基构造函数，并向其传递所需的参数的 Parameters 节中所示。Note that the constructor of the `TableProviderConnectionPoint` class calls the base constructor, passing it the required parameters as indicated in the Parameters section. 此外请注意，在`TableProviderWebPart`类，`GetConnectionInterface`方法指定为回调方法，对于连接，并`ConnectionProvider`特性声明自定义`TableProviderConnectionPoint`作为参数。Also note that in the `TableProviderWebPart` class, the `GetConnectionInterface` method is specified as the callback method for connections, and the `ConnectionProvider` attribute declares the custom `TableProviderConnectionPoint` as a parameter. 此示例演示如何创建自定义提供程序连接点，然后将其与提供者控件关联。This demonstrates how to create a custom provider connection point and then associate it with a provider control. 此示例假定，动态编译的源代码，因此应将源代码文件放在 Web 应用程序的 App_Code 子文件夹中。This example assumes that the source code is dynamically compiled, so you should place the source code file in an App_Code subfolder of your Web application. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/connectionControls.cs#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是承载静态 Web 部件连接中的自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom controls in a static Web Parts connection. 在页面的顶部是`Register`指令，用于声明前缀和自定义控件的命名空间。At the top of the page is a `Register` directive to declare a prefix and the namespace for the custom controls. 使用声明连接``元素，并提供者和使用者控件中声明``元素。The connection is declared by using an `` element, and the provider and consumer controls are declared within an `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 已在控件之间的连接存在，并使用者显示的数据提供程序，因为连接已声明为页中的静态连接。The connection between the controls already exists, and the consumer displays the data from the provider, because the connection was declared as a static connection in the page.

is or an empty string ("").

exception.span: 与提供程序控件（或从提供程序控件派生的有效类）的类型不同。

span.span: is not the same type as the provider control (or a valid class derived from it).
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
abstract member GetObject : System.Web.UI.Control -> obj override this.GetObject : System.Web.UI.Control -> obj

param.name: control
param.span: 在 Web 部件连接中用作提供者的控件。

span.span: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.

summary.span: 调用提供者控件中的回调方法，该方法获取一个接口实例以便返回给使用者。

span.span: Invokes the callback method in a provider control that gets an interface instance to return to consumers.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是提供者返回给使用者的接口实例，该接口用于建立连接。

span.span: An that is an instance of the interface a provider returns to consumers to establish a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个对象是用来建立连接的接口的实例的提供者控件中。This method returns an object from the provider control that is an instance of the interface used to establish a connection. 对象的类型将是接口的实现的类型。The type of the object will be the type of the implemented interface. 例如，为连接 Web 部件控件集所实现的两个接口和。For example, two interfaces that are implemented for connections in the Web Parts control set are and . 当上调用方法对象，如果关联的提供程序实现这些接口之一，返回的对象将属于相同的类型。When the method is called on a object, if the associated provider implements one of these interfaces, the returned object will be of the same type. 方法由调用对象时激活的连接。The method is called by objects when a connection is being activated. 这是实际启动的连接并开始过程，使两个控件能够共享数据的关键步骤。This is a critical step that actually initiates a connection and begins the process that enables two controls to share data. 在连接中的使用者控件必须能够与相同类型的接口作为提供程序。The consumer control in a connection must be able to work with the same type of interface as the provider. 如果未显示，控件的不兼容和对象必须用于建立连接。If it does not, the controls are incompatible and a object must be used to establish a connection.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection GetSecondaryInterfaces(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

abstract member GetSecondaryInterfaces : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection override this.GetSecondaryInterfaces : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection

param.name: control
param.span: 在 Web 部件连接中用作提供者的控件。

span.span: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.

summary.span: 获取受提供者连接点支持的辅助接口的可选集合。

span.span: Gets an optional collection of secondary interfaces that can be supported by a provider connection point.

returns.span: 其他接口的 ，这些接口由用作提供者的控件提供。

span.span: A of additional interfaces provided by the control acting as a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者连接点对象始终具有一个默认接口，用于建立与使用者的连接。A provider connection point object always has a default interface that is used to establish a connection with consumers. 通过调用检索默认接口的实例方法对象。An instance of the default interface is retrieved by calling the method on a object. 但是，某些提供程序控件将实现多个接口向使用者提供的连接的一部分。However, some provider controls will implement multiple interfaces to provide to consumers as part of a connection. 这些接口，不是默认的用于建立连接，称为辅助接口。These interfaces, which are not the default ones used to establish a connection, are called secondary interfaces. 方法提供了一种方法，就像返回到的辅助接口的引用的集合方法返回的默认接口的引用。The method provides a way to return a collection of references to the secondary interfaces, just as the method returns a reference to the default interface.

para.span: 中的方法类不包含任何实现; 它将返回空集合的辅助接口。

span.span: The method in the class contains no implementation; it returns an empty collection of secondary interfaces.

para.span: 若要实现此方法，则必须从类，并重写此方法，使之返回一组特定的辅助接口。

span.span: To implement this method, you must inherit from the class, and override this method, returning from it a specific set of secondary interfaces.
